name: df-ablo
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cablo, crab(s0, cgr, wral(s1, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
comment: Define the class of all Abelian group operations. (Contributed by NM, 2-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
